Shield archons defend the fortresses of Heaven against fiendish incursions. They wield their spears and shields in massive formations capable of withstanding any onslaught. Beneath their armor, they are sheathed in skin of steel. Given their tremendous strength and imposing stature, shield archons are ideal guardians of the meek and are sometimes summoned to the Material Plane to ward off the attacks of great numbers of evildoers. **[Recall Knowledge - Celestial](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 27 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22 [Shield Archon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=33) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 29 **Perception** +19; darkvision **Languages** [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +19, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +19, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +19, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +17 **Str** +5 **Dex** +1 **Con** +7 **Int** +2 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +3 **Morphic Hands** (divine, transmutation) A shield archon's hands can change into a _+1 [holy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=298) [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279)_ [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10) and a _[lesser sturdy shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=327)_ or back into hands. Transforming does not restore any HP to the items, and if either the weapon or shield is fully destroyed, the archon loses that hand until it receives a [_regenerate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=248) spell or similar magic. If a shield archon is slain, its weapon and shield can be taken, but they fade into nothingness after 24 hours. **Items** [_+1 full plate_](/Armor.aspx?ID=13) --- **AC** 31 (33 with shield raised) **Fort** +23 **Ref** +15 **Will** +19 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 125 **Weaknesses** evil 10 **Living Shield** A shield archon’s shield is the focal point of its courage and soul. It always has its shield raised without needing to Raise a Shield, and it can use Shield Block as a free action instead of a reaction (Hardness 10, HP 80). A shield archon can trigger its Shield Block free action when an ally within 10 feet is the target of an attack, reducing damage to that ally instead of itself but otherwise following the normal rules of Shield Block.
**Menacing Guardian** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61)) 30 feet. Enemies that start their turn in the area or enter it must attempt a DC 27 Will save. On a failure, they take a –1 status penalty to attack rolls, spell rolls, and damage rolls against any other target while in the aura for 24 hours or until they damage the archon, whichever comes first. On a critical failure, they can’t use hostile actions against any other target while in the area for 24 hours or until they damage the archon, whichever comes first. Regardless of the result, a creature is then temporarily immune to further menacing guardian auras for 24 hours.
**Retributive Strike** --- **Speed** 30 feet, fly 60 feet **Melee** _holy striking spear_ +22 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d6+10 piercing plus 1d6 good **Divine Innate Spells** DC 27 - **Cantrips (5th)** [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190) - **1st** [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) (x3) - **2nd** [Shield Other](/Spells.aspx?ID=281) (x3) - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will) - **Constant (5th)** [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340) **Archon's Door** Once per day, if an archon sees another creature cast [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), it can cast an innate [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (heightened to 5th level) within 1 round to attempt to follow that creature to the maximum distance of the archon’s [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69). If the archon’s [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) has enough distance, the archon appears the same distance and direction from the creature as before either used [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69). **Courageous Switch** When a shield archon uses its [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) innate spell, it can choose to move into the space of a willing ally it can see within range. If it does so, the ally switches places with the archon, appearing in the space the archon just vacated, as if it too had cast [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69).
name: Shield Archon
